resources.string:
更新：
 104 學年度下學期行事曆
 通知圖示

優化：
 開啟網頁速度
 Loading效果
 細節
 部分特效

修正：
 行事曆崩潰之錯誤
 部分用戶最新消息崩潰
 部分翻譯錯誤

新增
 缺曠課之星期幾
我們全都包了\n只剩下學校不包我們
Are you sure you want to log out?
Are you sure to add \"%s\" to your calendar?
An error occurred, click to retry
Are you sure to reserve a seat from %s at %s ?
Are you sure to cancel a seat from %s at %s ?
Oops! You haven\'t reserved any bus~\n Ride public transport to save the Earth %s
Oops! No bus today~\n Please choose another date %s
Oops! No class for this semester~\n Please choose another semester %s
Rotate Screen to see weekend schedule %s
Oops! No record for this semester~\nPlease choose another semester %s
Rotate screen to see night school absent record and day of week %s
Oops! No absent record for this semester~\nPlease choose another semester %s
Coming Soon~\nDonate to use this feature now!
This is a beta version, please report a bug if an error occurred!
You have not chosen a date!\n Please choose a date first %s
This is not an easter egg
Help and support the programmer\nto use new features!

Oops!Something went wrong :(
GO to Google Play
 search for KUAS AP Donate 
 to support the author!
Reminder will pop up 30 mins before reserved bus !\nIf you reserved or canceled the seat via website, please restart the app.
You\'ve got a bus departing at %s from %s!
Will turn on silent mode during class, turn back to normal mode after class!
Reminder will pop up 10mins before class starts!

The best KUAS Campus App
KUAS AP

Are you a freshman?
Don't know about school info, telephone numbers, or up coming events?
Been here a few years?
Have checking class schedule, report card and reserving bus seats drove you crazy?

No more, no more worries, anymore!

KUAS AP lets no matter old or new fellow
have control over your life in KUAS!

From checking class schedule, report card to your absence records!
Plus reserving/canceling bus seats with newest school feeds!



Much Simple, Many Convenient, Very instinct, wow!

☆FABULOUS☆
呂紹榕(Louie Lu), 姜尚德(JohnThunder), \nregisterAutumn, 詹濬鍵(Evans), \n陳建霖(HearSilent)

“Ask not why nobody is doing this. You are 'nobody'.”

We did this cause no one did it.
We created KUAS Wifi Login, KUAS AP and KUAS Gourmet, Course Selection Sim, etc…
To bring convenience to everyone's on campus!

If you're experienced in Objective-C, Swift, Java or you're interested in Coding! 

Message us at our Facebook fanpage!
Your code might one day be operating in everyone's hands~

In year 2014,
we founded KUAS Information Technology Club!

If you're enthusiastic or drawn to our projects, join our classes and talks or come by to chat!

https://github.com/hearsilent/KUAS-AP-Material

array.name: easter_egg
array.item: Are you a master of Obj-C ?
Or are you good at Swift ?
Maybe you\'re a skillful Java programmer?
Stop trying to penetrate me, come to KUAS IT Club!
John is a white hac… uhm…
Heard of Lu\? He\'s Tyr of KUAS\!
